text: Hello everyone, Does anyone know if I can add a bespoke setting in the field.json that will only work for sections not the theme overall?

The effect of theme fields can be as broad or narrow as you want them to be. The values of theme fields don’t do anything on their own — you have to their value somewhere, and you have full control over how broad or narrow you want that to be.

For example, if you want a theme field to only influence elements with the class `.special-section`, you can add the theme field and only call it in your CSS for the `.special-section` class.
